answers.answer: I went to the doctor today and my baby was about the same size but the doctor said that's small. Idk what these doctors are trying to do to us. Lol
The doctor was talking about gestational diabetes so I was worried but I didn't have GB with my first and he was born at 9lb 7oz
At 18 wks my baby was 8 oz....at 28 wks baby was measuring larger at 3lb 3oz
23 wks and 6 days my baby is 1 lb and 4 oz...
Charlies I have type 1 diabetes. Got it with the onset of my first pregnancy....

question: I am 23 weeks and had an ultrasound today. My baby is 1 pound 7 ounces. The doctor said that's big. Does anyone else know their baby's weight at this time.
title: fetal weight
